channel.title: How do I add a Shop/NPC?
channel.description:
How do I add a Shop/NPC where I want to? I've tried a few things that never worked. :mad: Can anybody help?
Purez4life

item.title: How do I add a Shop/NPC?
item.dc:creator: @I_robin_I I robin I
item.description:
@I_robin_I wrote:

get a shop maker and edit up a shop, use coords and things and after you make your shop edit it to shops.cfg =] guessig thats what you do since iv had my head crammed with this stuff o.O

Edit:

Also if you go to † Nirvana † post it could be useful/helpful seeing other ppls posts. Infact on 1st page you’ll see a question about shops just like yours.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add a Shop/NPC?
